revision.text:
This is the default [[sound sequence]] for closing a normal door with a DORS* texture in ''[[Strife]]''. It is redirected from [[DoorStone]]. It is also used for opening [[animated door]]s with the DORSTN01 texture.
==== [[SNDSEQ]] definition ==== :DoorCloseStone play doors/stone_close nostopcutoff end [[Category:Sound sequences]]
